column2: "Don't you hate how the planet Naberius is wet and rainy during this season. "
"It just really brings you down, right. Mr. Umblla hasn't appeared either..."
"Also, when gathering info from eyewitnesses, the only common point was that rain was falling..."
"Hm, I wonder... Does he often appear when there is a heavy rain... maybe?"
"I'm I can't help but wonder about that... could...could you do an investigation, even a small one?!"
